casebody.data:
Andres AVALOS, Jr., Appellant,
v.
STATE of Florida, Appellee. Case No. 2D17-2546 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed December 5, 2018. Howard L. Dimmig, II, Public Defender, and James R. Wulchak, Special Assistant Public Defender, Bartow, for Appellant. Pamela Jo Bondi, Attorney General, Tallahassee. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed.

CASANUEVA, BADALAMENTI, and ROTHSTEIN-YOUAKIM, JJ., Concur.
